name: Me and my Blob
description:
Keyboard: WASD to move. Shift to dash. Space to jump. Z to super-jump.

"Me and my Blob" is a 2.5D platform game made in Unity. You play as Science Girl who's trying to escape a collapsing laboratory after an accident . Blob took the opportunity to use her as a host, forcing her to collaborate with him to get out.

Eat other scientists and use Blob's physical abilities to escape the laboratory. 

This game was created for the Spooky 2D Jam '21 by Team Monkey Haha

Olivier Barbeau : Creature Artist, texture artist

Émile Bouchard : Lead programmer

Félix Gagné : UI and programming

Guo Rui Huang : Rigger, animator and vfx

Hugo Lambert : 2D Art

Fanny Ngo : 3D Artist and animator, character design

John Williams Ortiz Kardos : Tech Art
